knet-r
======


Install rmarkdown from github
```{r}
devtools::install_github("rstudio/rmarkdown")
```

Install tufte R handout templates from github
```{r}
devtools::install_github("tufterhandout", "sachsmc")
```

Install Knitr
```{r}
devtools::install("knitr")
```

Install the grammar for graphics package
```{r}
devtools::install("ggplot2")
```

Install the grammar for graphics addon GGally package
```{r}
devtools::install("GGally")
```

Install the diagram package (optional)
```{r}
devtools::install("diagram")
```

Install the diagram package (optional)
```{r}
devtools::install("plyr")
```

Install igraph - graph an network analysis and manipulation package
```{r}
devtools::install(igraph)  # graph manipulation and anlysis
```

Install tm - the text mining package
```{r}
devtools::install("tm")
```

Install RTextTools - the other high level text mining package
```{r}
devtools::install("RTextTools")
```
